QuestData.Title: Out of the Dream
QuestData.Description: Malfurion Stormrage... A name I have not heard in centuries.$B$BHe was teacher to many of us. If he seeks my audience, I cannot refuse.$B$BI will go to the Grove of Cenarius, but first, we must awaken the rest of my clan. They slumber with no way of waking.$b$bA mysterious force of great power is at work against us.$B$BI am still too weak from my hibernation. Please, stranger, go and free them from their dreams.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Druids of the Claw must awaken. We are needed.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, hero. With my brethren at my side, we will be ready to aid Malfurion.
